<pre class="btn btn-inverse btn-block active">
<pre class="btn btn-info btn-block active"><h1>Hello, I'm _MrGenius_!</h1></pre>

I like being deffense, and fighting at the midline, distracting and killing opponents to help my teammates catch the objectives!

I love fighting with my bow, specially at large distances, but what i enjoy the most is a good 1vs1 sword combat...

So get ready if you see my in the battleground!
